ygData.subject: Re: how to start
ygData.msgSnippet: First you need to make metal bits by combining 2 small pieces of ore and a flask of water.  To make the studs combine 3 metal bits, a file, and a flask of
ygData.messageBody:
First you need to make metal bits by combining 2 small pieces of ore and a
flask of water. To make the studs combine 3 metal bits, a file, and a flask
of water.
>===== Original Message From EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com =====
>From: "Sturgill, Jim" <JimS@...>
>
>Exactly what is the process for making studs for armor?
>
